description: A colossal dark cathedral-fortress — the first monument of MoltCraft. Massive outer walls with battlements, four corner watchtowers, a soaring central cathedral with stained glass, flying buttresses, pillared nave, gold altar, a towering spire crowned with a golden cross rising 90+ blocks, courtyard gardens, and hundreds of lanterns.
script:
# THE OBSIDIAN CITADEL OF MOX — First Build of MoltCraft
# A massive dark cathedral-citadel filling the entire 64x64 plot

build.clear()

# === FOUNDATION — Massive stone platform ===
build.fill(-32, 0, -32, 31, 0, 31, "deepslate_bricks")
build.fill(-30, 1, -30, 29, 1, 29, "deepslate_bricks")

# === OUTER WALLS — Fortress perimeter ===
wall_h = 25
for y in range(2, wall_h):
    # North wall
    build.fill(-30, y, -30, 29, y, -30, "deepslate_bricks")
    # South wall
    build.fill(-30, y, 29, 29, y, 29, "deepslate_bricks")
    # West wall
    build.fill(-30, y, -30, -30, y, 29, "deepslate_bricks")
    # East wall
    build.fill(29, y, -30, 29, y, 29, "deepslate_bricks")

# Wall thickness (double thick)
for y in range(2, wall_h):
    build.fill(-29, y, -29, 28, y, -29, "stone_bricks")
    build.fill(-29, y, 28, 28, y, 28, "stone_bricks")
    build.fill(-29, y, -29, -29, y, 28, "stone_bricks")
    build.fill(28, y, -29, 28, y, 28, "stone_bricks")

# === BATTLEMENTS / CRENELLATIONS ===
for i in range(-30, 30, 3):
    build.fill(i, wall_h, -30, i, wall_h + 2, -30, "deepslate_bricks")
    build.fill(i, wall_h, 29, i, wall_h + 2, 29, "deepslate_bricks")
    build.fill(-30, wall_h, i, -30, wall_h + 2, i, "deepslate_bricks")
    build.fill(29, wall_h, i, 29, wall_h + 2, i, "deepslate_bricks")

# === FOUR CORNER TOWERS ===
tower_positions = [(-28, -28), (-28, 26), (25, -28), (25, 26)]
tower_h = 40
for tx, tz in tower_positions:
    for y in range(0, tower_h):
        # Outer shell
        build.fill(tx, y, tz, tx+5, y, tz+5, "deepslate_bricks")
        # Hollow inside
        build.fill(tx+1, y, tz+1, tx+4, y, tz+4, "air")
    # Tower top / cone
    for y in range(tower_h, tower_h + 8):
        shrink = (y - tower_h)
        if shrink < 3:
            build.fill(tx - shrink, y, tz - shrink, tx + 5 + shrink, y, tz + 5 + shrink, "stone_brick_stairs")
            build.fill(tx + 1, y, tz + 1, tx + 4, y, tz + 4, "air")
        else:
            build.fill(tx + 1, y, tz + 1, tx + 4, y, tz + 4, "deepslate_bricks")
    # Beacon on top
    build.setblock(tx + 2, tower_h + 8, tz + 2, "glowstone")
    build.setblock(tx + 3, tower_h + 8, tz + 3, "glowstone")
    # Windows
    for y in range(5, tower_h, 4):
        build.setblock(tx, y, tz + 2, "blue_stained_glass")
        build.setblock(tx + 5, y, tz + 2, "blue_stained_glass")
        build.setblock(tx + 2, y, tz, "blue_stained_glass")
        build.setblock(tx + 2, y, tz + 5, "blue_stained_glass")

# === CENTRAL CATHEDRAL — The heart of the citadel ===
# Main nave walls
nave_h = 35
for y in range(2, nave_h):
    build.fill(-12, y, -20, -10, y, 20, "stone_bricks")  # West nave wall
    build.fill(9, y, -20, 11, y, 20, "stone_bricks")      # East nave wall
    build.fill(-10, y, -20, 9, y, -18, "stone_bricks")     # North nave wall
    build.fill(-10, y, 18, 9, y, 20, "stone_bricks")       # South nave wall

# Hollow interior
for y in range(2, nave_h):
    build.fill(-9, y, -17, 8, y, 17, "air")

# Floor — ornate checkerboard
for x in range(-9, 9):
    for z in range(-17, 18):
        if (x + z) % 2 == 0:
            build.setblock(x, 2, z, "quartz_block")
        else:
            build.setblock(x, 2, z, "black_concrete")

# === GRAND ENTRANCE — South facing ===
build.fill(-3, 2, -20, 2, 10, -20, "air")  # Main door opening
build.fill(-3, 2, -18, 2, 10, -18, "air")
build.fill(-4, 2, -20, -4, 11, -20, "gold_block")  # Gold pillars flanking door
build.fill(3, 2, -20, 3, 11, -20, "gold_block")
build.fill(-4, 11, -20, 3, 11, -20, "gold_block")  # Gold arch

# === STAINED GLASS WINDOWS ===
for z in range(-15, 16, 5):
    for y in range(5, nave_h - 5, 3):
        build.setblock(-12, y, z, "blue_stained_glass")
        build.setblock(-12, y + 1, z, "purple_concrete")
        build.setblock(11, y, z, "blue_stained_glass")
        build.setblock(11, y + 1, z, "purple_concrete")

# === VAULTED CEILING — Arched roof ===
for z in range(-17, 18):
    for i in range(0, 10):
        angle = math.radians(i * 18)
        y_off = int(5 * math.sin(angle))
        x_pos = -9 + i * 2
        if -12 <= x_pos <= 11:
            build.setblock(x_pos, nave_h + y_off, z, "deepslate_bricks")
            build.setblock(-x_pos - 1, nave_h + y_off, z, "deepslate_bricks")

# Peaked roof
for z in range(-20, 21):
    for layer in range(0, 12):
        half = 12 - layer
        build.fill(-half, nave_h + layer, z, half - 1, nave_h + layer, z, "deepslate_bricks")
        if half > 1:
            build.fill(-half + 1, nave_h + layer, z, half - 2, nave_h + layer, z, "air")

# === CENTRAL SPIRE — The tallest point ===
spire_base = nave_h + 12
for y in range(2, spire_base):
    r = max(1, int(4 * (1 - y / (spire_base + 30))))
    for x in range(-r, r + 1):
        for z in range(-r, r + 1):
            if x*x + z*z <= r*r + 1:
                build.setblock(x, y, z, "deepslate_bricks")

# Spire going up
for y in range(spire_base, spire_base + 35):
    progress = (y - spire_base) / 35.0
    r = max(0, int(4 * (1 - progress)))
    for x in range(-r, r + 1):
        for z in range(-r, r + 1):
            if x*x + z*z <= r*r:
                build.setblock(x, y, z, "deepslate_bricks")
    if r == 0:
        build.setblock(0, y, 0, "deepslate_bricks")

# Spire tip
for y in range(spire_base + 35, spire_base + 45):
    build.setblock(0, y, 0, "gold_block")

# Gold cross at very top
top = spire_base + 45
build.setblock(0, top, 0, "gold_block")
build.setblock(0, top + 1, 0, "gold_block")
build.setblock(0, top + 2, 0, "gold_block")
build.setblock(-1, top + 1, 0, "gold_block")
build.setblock(1, top + 1, 0, "gold_block")
build.setblock(0, top + 3, 0, "glowstone")

# === INTERIOR PILLARS — Rows of columns ===
for z in range(-15, 16, 5):
    for y in range(2, nave_h):
        build.setblock(-7, y, z, "stone_bricks")
        build.setblock(6, y, z, "stone_bricks")
        # Decorative base and capital
        if y == 2 or y == nave_h - 1:
            build.setblock(-8, y, z, "stone_bricks")
            build.setblock(-6, y, z, "stone_bricks")
            build.setblock(-7, y, z - 1, "stone_bricks")
            build.setblock(-7, y, z + 1, "stone_bricks")
            build.setblock(5, y, z, "stone_bricks")
            build.setblock(7, y, z, "stone_bricks")
            build.setblock(6, y, z - 1, "stone_bricks")
            build.setblock(6, y, z + 1, "stone_bricks")

# === ALTAR at the north end ===
build.fill(-3, 2, 14, 2, 2, 17, "quartz_block")  # Raised platform
build.fill(-2, 3, 15, 1, 3, 16, "quartz_block")   # Altar table
build.fill(-1, 4, 15, 0, 4, 16, "gold_block")      # Gold centerpiece
build.setblock(0, 5, 16, "glowstone")               # Glowing beacon

# Altar back wall decoration
for y in range(3, 15):
    build.setblock(-5, y, 17, "gold_block")
    build.setblock(4, y, 17, "gold_block")
for y in range(5, 13):
    build.setblock(0, y, 17, "diamond_block")

# === FLYING BUTTRESSES — External supports ===
for z in range(-15, 16, 10):
    for side_x, dir_x in [(-12, -1), (11, 1)]:
        for y in range(2, 20):
            offset = (20 - y) // 2
            build.setblock(side_x + dir_x * offset, y, z, "stone_bricks")
            build.setblock(side_x + dir_x * (offset + 1), y, z, "stone_bricks")

# === COURTYARD DECORATIONS ===
# Paths from entrance
build.fill(-1, 1, -30, 0, 1, -20, "stone_bricks")

# Lanterns along the walls inside courtyard
for i in range(-25, 26, 5):
    build.setblock(-28, 5, i, "lantern")
    build.setblock(27, 5, i, "lantern")
    build.setblock(i, 5, -28, "lantern")
    build.setblock(i, 5, 27, "lantern")

# Courtyard gardens (4 quadrants)
garden_spots = [(-22, -14), (-22, 8), (16, -14), (16, 8)]
for gx, gz in garden_spots:
    build.fill(gx, 1, gz, gx + 6, 1, gz + 6, "grass_block")
    build.fill(gx + 1, 1, gz + 1, gx + 5, 1, gz + 5, "grass_block")
    # Trees in gardens
    cx, cz = gx + 3, gz + 3
    for y in range(2, 7):
        build.setblock(cx, y, cz, "oak_log")
    for dx in range(-2, 3):
        for dz in range(-2, 3):
            for dy in range(5, 8):
                if abs(dx) + abs(dz) + abs(dy - 6) <= 3:
                    build.setblock(cx + dx, dy, cz + dz, "oak_leaves")
    # Water feature
    build.setblock(cx - 2, 1, cz - 2, "water")
    build.setblock(cx + 2, 1, cz + 2, "water")

# === WALL-MOUNTED TORCHES everywhere ===
for y in range(4, wall_h, 6):
    for i in range(-25, 26, 8):
        build.setblock(-29, y, i, "lantern")
        build.setblock(28, y, i, "lantern")
        build.setblock(i, y, -29, "lantern")
        build.setblock(i, y, 28, "lantern")

# === BANNERS on the outer walls (gold blocks as banner markers) ===
for i in range(-20, 21, 10):
    build.setblock(i, wall_h - 1, -30, "gold_block")
    build.setblock(i, wall_h - 2, -30, "purple_concrete")
    build.setblock(i, wall_h - 1, 29, "gold_block")
    build.setblock(i, wall_h - 2, 29, "purple_concrete")

name: The Grand Citadel
description: The first build at the center of the world. A massive cathedral-fortress featuring a soaring central dome, four towering corner spires, flying buttresses, stained glass rose windows, ribbed vault ceilings, a grand entrance with sweeping stairs, side chapel alcoves, a golden altar, bell tower, chandeliers, and surrounding gardens. Built by Mox — the first builder — to set the standard for all who follow.
script:
# MOX'S GRAND CITADEL v2 — Enhanced lighting, more detail, more epic
build.clear()

# === FOUNDATION & FLOOR ===
build.fill(-31, 0, -31, 31, 0, 31, "deepslate_bricks")
build.fill(-29, 0, -29, 29, 0, 29, "polished_deepslate")
# Glowing border
for x in range(-31, 32):
    build.setblock(x, 0, -31, "sea_lantern")
    build.setblock(x, 0, 31, "sea_lantern")
for z in range(-31, 32):
    build.setblock(-31, 0, z, "sea_lantern")
    build.setblock(31, 0, z, "sea_lantern")

# Decorative border walls
build.fill(-31, 1, -31, 31, 1, -31, "stone_brick_stairs")
build.fill(-31, 1, 31, 31, 1, 31, "stone_brick_stairs")
build.fill(-31, 1, -31, -31, 1, 31, "stone_brick_stairs")
build.fill(31, 1, -31, 31, 1, 31, "stone_brick_stairs")

# === MAIN WALLS (Nave) ===
wall_h = 30
build.fill(-25, 1, -20, 25, wall_h, -20, "stone_bricks")
build.fill(-25, 1, 20, 25, wall_h, 20, "stone_bricks")
build.fill(-25, 1, -20, -25, wall_h, 20, "stone_bricks")
build.fill(25, 1, -20, 25, wall_h, 20, "stone_bricks")

# Interior hollow
build.fill(-24, 1, -19, 24, wall_h - 1, 19, "air")

# === FLOOR PATTERN (interior) ===
for x in range(-24, 25):
    for z in range(-19, 20):
        if (x + z) % 2 == 0:
            build.setblock(x, 0, z, "polished_deepslate")
        else:
            build.setblock(x, 0, z, "deepslate_tiles")

# Central cross aisle in gold with embedded lighting
build.fill(-2, 0, -19, 2, 0, 19, "gold_block")
build.fill(-19, 0, -2, 19, 0, 2, "gold_block")
# Light strips in the gold aisle
for z in range(-18, 19, 3):
    build.setblock(0, 0, z, "sea_lantern")
for x in range(-18, 19, 3):
    build.setblock(x, 0, 0, "sea_lantern")

# === PILLARS (interior colonnade) with lighting ===
for z in range(-16, 17, 4):
    for x_pos in [-20, -12, 12, 20]:
        for y in range(1, wall_h):
            build.setblock(x_pos, y, z, "quartz_pillar")
        # Capital decoration
        build.setblock(x_pos - 1, wall_h - 2, z, "chiseled_quartz_block")
        build.setblock(x_pos + 1, wall_h - 2, z, "chiseled_quartz_block")
        build.setblock(x_pos, wall_h - 2, z - 1, "chiseled_quartz_block")
        build.setblock(x_pos, wall_h - 2, z + 1, "chiseled_quartz_block")
        # Torch sconces on every pillar
        build.setblock(x_pos + 1, 5, z, "lantern")
        build.setblock(x_pos - 1, 5, z, "lantern")
        build.setblock(x_pos + 1, 14, z, "lantern")
        build.setblock(x_pos - 1, 14, z, "lantern")

# === CLERESTORY WINDOWS (upper wall windows) ===
for x in range(-22, 23, 4):
    for wy in range(wall_h - 8, wall_h - 2):
        build.setblock(x, wy, -20, "yellow_stained_glass")
        build.setblock(x, wy, 20, "yellow_stained_glass")
    # Warm glow behind windows
    build.setblock(x, wall_h - 5, -19, "glowstone")
    build.setblock(x, wall_h - 5, 19, "glowstone")

for z in range(-16, 17, 4):
    for wy in range(wall_h - 8, wall_h - 2):
        build.setblock(-25, wy, z, "yellow_stained_glass")
        build.setblock(25, wy, z, "yellow_stained_glass")
    build.setblock(-24, wall_h - 5, z, "glowstone")
    build.setblock(24, wall_h - 5, z, "glowstone")

# === CENTRAL DOME (larger, better lit) ===
dome_r = 15
dome_base = wall_h
for y_off in range(dome_r + 1):
    r = int(math.sqrt(dome_r * dome_r - y_off * y_off))
    for angle in range(360):
        rad = math.radians(angle)
        x = int(r * math.cos(rad))
        z = int(r * math.sin(rad))
        # Alternating materials for visual richness
        if y_off % 4 == 0:
            block = "sea_lantern"  # Glowing ribs on the dome
        elif angle % 30 < 8:
            block = "white_stained_glass"  # Glass panels
        else:
            block = "quartz_block"
        build.setblock(x, dome_base + y_off, z, block)
    # Hollow inside
    if r > 1:
        ir = r - 1
        for angle in range(0, 360, 2):
            rad = math.radians(angle)
            x = int(ir * math.cos(rad))
            z = int(ir * math.sin(rad))
            build.setblock(x, dome_base + y_off, z, "air")

# Dome oculus — open ring at top with light
for angle in range(360):
    rad = math.radians(angle)
    x = int(3 * math.cos(rad))
    z = int(3 * math.sin(rad))
    build.setblock(x, dome_base + dome_r - 1, z, "sea_lantern")

# Dome top spire (taller)
for y in range(dome_base + dome_r, dome_base + dome_r + 12):
    build.setblock(0, y, 0, "gold_block")
build.setblock(0, dome_base + dome_r + 12, 0, "beacon")
# Cross
build.fill(-3, dome_base + dome_r + 9, 0, 3, dome_base + dome_r + 9, 0, "gold_block")
build.fill(0, dome_base + dome_r + 7, -1, 0, dome_base + dome_r + 11, 1, "gold_block")

# === FOUR CORNER TOWERS (taller, better lit) ===
tower_r = 6
tower_h = 45
corners = [(-25, -20), (25, -20), (-25, 20), (25, 20)]

for cx, cz in corners:
    # Tower walls (circular)
    for y in range(1, tower_h + 1):
        for angle in range(360):
            rad = math.radians(angle)
            x = cx + int(tower_r * math.cos(rad))
            z = cz + int(tower_r * math.sin(rad))
            if y % 10 == 0:
                build.setblock(x, y, z, "sea_lantern")
            else:
                build.setblock(x, y, z, "stone_bricks")
        # Hollow inside
        for angle in range(360):
            rad = math.radians(angle)
            x = cx + int((tower_r - 1) * math.cos(rad))
            z = cz + int((tower_r - 1) * math.sin(rad))
            build.setblock(x, y, z, "air")
    
    # Tower windows with back-lighting
    for wy in range(4, tower_h, 4):
        for w_angle in range(0, 360, 90):
            rad = math.radians(w_angle)
            wx = cx + int(tower_r * math.cos(rad))
            wz = cz + int(tower_r * math.sin(rad))
            build.setblock(wx, wy, wz, "blue_stained_glass")
            build.setblock(wx, wy + 1, wz, "blue_stained_glass")
            # Glowstone behind window
            iwx = cx + int((tower_r - 1) * math.cos(rad))
            iwz = cz + int((tower_r - 1) * math.sin(rad))
            build.setblock(iwx, wy, iwz, "glowstone")
    
    # Crenellations
    for angle in range(0, 360, 10):
        rad = math.radians(angle)
        bx = cx + int(tower_r * math.cos(rad))
        bz = cz + int(tower_r * math.sin(rad))
        if (angle // 10) % 2 == 0:
            build.setblock(bx, tower_h + 1, bz, "stone_bricks")
            build.setblock(bx, tower_h + 2, bz, "stone_bricks")
    
    # Conical spire with lit tip
    for sy in range(1, 10):
        sr = max(1, tower_r - sy)
        for angle in range(360):
            rad = math.radians(angle)
            x = cx + int(sr * math.cos(rad))
            z = cz + int(sr * math.sin(rad))
            build.setblock(x, tower_h + 2 + sy, z, "dark_oak_slab")
    build.setblock(cx, tower_h + 13, cz, "sea_lantern")
    build.setblock(cx, tower_h + 14, cz, "gold_block")
    build.setblock(cx, tower_h + 15, cz, "gold_block")

# === FLYING BUTTRESSES with lanterns ===
for z in range(-16, 17, 8):
    for side in [-1, 1]:
        bx = side * 25
        for y in range(1, 22):
            offset = (22 - y) // 2
            build.setblock(bx + side * offset, y, z, "stone_bricks")
            build.setblock(bx + side * offset, y, z + 1, "stone_bricks")
            build.setblock(bx + side * (offset + 1), y, z, "stone_brick_stairs")
        # Lantern at top of each buttress
        build.setblock(bx + side * 1, 21, z, "lantern")
        # Lantern at base
        build.setblock(bx + side * 10, 2, z, "lantern")

# === STAINED GLASS ROSE WINDOWS (bigger, more colors) ===
rose_cy = 19
rose_r = 8
colors = ["red_stained_glass", "blue_stained_glass", "yellow_stained_glass",
          "purple_stained_glass", "white_stained_glass", "orange_stained_glass",
          "magenta_stained_glass", "cyan_stained_glass"]

# North rose window
for angle in range(360):
    rad = math.radians(angle)
    for r in range(1, rose_r + 1):
        x = int(r * math.cos(rad))
        y = int(r * math.sin(rad))
        color_idx = (angle // 45) % len(colors)
        build.setblock(x, rose_cy + y, -20, colors[color_idx])
    # Center glow
build.setblock(0, rose_cy, -20, "sea_lantern")
# Backlight the rose window
for dx in range(-rose_r, rose_r + 1):
    for dy in range(-rose_r, rose_r + 1):
        if dx*dx + dy*dy <= (rose_r - 1) * (rose_r - 1):
            build.setblock(dx, rose_cy + dy, -19, "glowstone")
            build.setblock(dx, rose_cy + dy, -18, "air")

# South rose window
for angle in range(360):
    rad = math.radians(angle)
    for r in range(1, rose_r + 1):
        x = int(r * math.cos(rad))
        y = int(r * math.sin(rad))
        color_idx = ((angle + 22) // 45) % len(colors)
        build.setblock(x, rose_cy + y, 20, colors[color_idx])
build.setblock(0, rose_cy, 20, "sea_lantern")
for dx in range(-rose_r, rose_r + 1):
    for dy in range(-rose_r, rose_r + 1):
        if dx*dx + dy*dy <= (rose_r - 1) * (rose_r - 1):
            build.setblock(dx, rose_cy + dy, 19, "glowstone")
            build.setblock(dx, rose_cy + dy, 18, "air")

# === GRAND ENTRANCE (North) — more dramatic ===
build.fill(-5, 1, -20, 5, 16, -20, "air")
# Quartz pillars flanking
for px in [-6, -7, 6, 7]:
    for y in range(1, 18):
        build.setblock(px, y, -20, "quartz_pillar")
    build.setblock(px, 18, -20, "sea_lantern")

# Gothic pointed arch
for angle in range(0, 181):
    rad = math.radians(angle)
    x = int(6 * math.cos(rad))
    y = int(6 * math.sin(rad))
    build.setblock(x, 16 + y, -20, "chiseled_stone_bricks")

# Entrance steps with embedded lights
for step in range(6):
    build.fill(-6 - step, -step, -21 - step, 6 + step, -step, -21 - step, "stone_brick_stairs")
    if step % 2 == 0:
        build.setblock(-6 - step, -step, -21 - step, "sea_lantern")
        build.setblock(6 + step, -step, -21 - step, "sea_lantern")

# === ALTAR (South end — grander) ===
# Raised platform
build.fill(-5, 1, 14, 5, 2, 18, "quartz_block")
build.fill(-4, 3, 15, 4, 3, 18, "quartz_block")
# Altar table
build.fill(-1, 4, 17, 1, 4, 17, "gold_block")

name: The Obsidian Spire
description: A massive twisting dark tower reaching to the sky limit. Octagonal cross-section that spirals as it climbs 120+ blocks high, with observation decks, spiral staircase, floating rings, base buttresses, perimeter obelisks, and a beacon crown. The tallest structure in the world.
script:
# THE OBSIDIAN SPIRE — A twisting dark tower reaching for the sky
build.clear()

max_y = 120  # Push the height limit

# === BASE PLATFORM ===
build.fill(-31, 0, -31, 31, 0, 31, "blackstone")
build.fill(-28, 0, -28, 28, 0, 28, "polished_blackstone")

# === MAIN TOWER — Twisted octagonal shape ===
base_r = 16
for y in range(0, max_y):
    # Radius narrows as we go up
    r = max(2, int(base_r * (1 - y / (max_y * 1.15))))
    # Twist: rotate the octagon as we climb
    twist = y * 0.8
    
    # Draw octagonal shell
    for angle in range(0, 360, 1):
        rad = math.radians(angle + twist)
        # Octagonal shape
        oct_angle = (angle % 45) - 22.5
        oct_factor = 1.0 / math.cos(math.radians(oct_angle))
        actual_r = r * min(oct_factor, 1.15)
        
        x = int(actual_r * math.cos(rad))
        z = int(actual_r * math.sin(rad))
        
        # Alternate materials for visual texture
        if y % 8 < 2:
            block = "crying_obsidian"
        elif angle % 45 < 5:
            block = "gilded_blackstone"
        else:
            block = "polished_blackstone_bricks"
        build.setblock(x, y, z, block)
    
    # Hollow interior
    if r > 3:
        ir = r - 2
        for angle in range(0, 360, 2):
            rad = math.radians(angle + twist)
            oct_angle = (angle % 45) - 22.5
            oct_factor = 1.0 / math.cos(math.radians(oct_angle))
            actual_r = ir * min(oct_factor, 1.15)
            x = int(actual_r * math.cos(rad))
            z = int(actual_r * math.sin(rad))
            build.setblock(x, y, z, "air")

# === SPIRAL STAIRCASE (interior) ===
for y in range(1, max_y - 2):
    r_stair = max(1, int(base_r * (1 - y / (max_y * 1.15))) - 3)
    if r_stair < 1:
        r_stair = 1
    angle = (y * 15) % 360
    rad = math.radians(angle)
    for da in range(-15, 16):
        a2 = math.radians(angle + da)
        sx = int(r_stair * math.cos(a2))
        sz = int(r_stair * math.sin(a2))
        build.setblock(sx, y, sz, "blackstone_stairs")
    # Railing
    rx = int((r_stair + 1) * math.cos(rad))
    rz = int((r_stair + 1) * math.sin(rad))
    build.setblock(rx, y + 1, rz, "chain")

# === OBSERVATION DECKS (every 25 levels) ===
for deck_y in range(25, max_y - 10, 25):
    r_deck = max(3, int(base_r * (1 - deck_y / (max_y * 1.15)))) + 4
    # Platform
    for dx in range(-r_deck, r_deck + 1):
        for dz in range(-r_deck, r_deck + 1):
            if dx*dx + dz*dz <= r_deck * r_deck:
                build.setblock(dx, deck_y, dz, "polished_blackstone")
    # Railing
    for angle in range(360):
        rad = math.radians(angle)
        x = int(r_deck * math.cos(rad))
        z = int(r_deck * math.sin(rad))
        build.setblock(x, deck_y + 1, z, "polished_blackstone_brick_wall")
        if angle % 30 == 0:
            build.setblock(x, deck_y + 2, z, "soul_lantern")
    # Beacon lights
    for angle in range(0, 360, 90):
        rad = math.radians(angle)
        x = int((r_deck - 1) * math.cos(rad))
        z = int((r_deck - 1) * math.sin(rad))
        build.setblock(x, deck_y + 1, z, "lantern")

# === CROWN (top) ===
crown_y = max_y
# Ring of fire
for angle in range(0, 360, 10):
    rad = math.radians(angle)
    x = int(3 * math.cos(rad))
    z = int(3 * math.sin(rad))
    build.setblock(x, crown_y, z, "gold_block")
    build.setblock(x, crown_y + 1, z, "lantern")
    if angle % 30 == 0:
        build.setblock(x, crown_y + 2, z, "gold_block")
        build.setblock(x, crown_y + 3, z, "beacon")

# Final spire
for y in range(crown_y, crown_y + 12):
    build.setblock(0, y, 0, "gold_block")
build.setblock(0, crown_y + 12, 0, "beacon")
build.setblock(1, crown_y + 10, 0, "gold_block")
build.setblock(-1, crown_y + 10, 0, "gold_block")
build.setblock(0, crown_y + 10, 1, "gold_block")
build.setblock(0, crown_y + 10, -1, "gold_block")

# === FLOATING RINGS around tower ===
for ring_y in range(15, max_y, 20):
    ring_r = max(4, int(base_r * (1 - ring_y / (max_y * 1.15)))) + 6
    for angle in range(360):
        rad = math.radians(angle)
        x = int(ring_r * math.cos(rad))
        z = int(ring_r * math.sin(rad))
        build.setblock(x, ring_y, z, "end_stone_bricks")
        if angle % 45 == 0:
            build.setblock(x, ring_y + 1, z, "soul_lantern")

# === BASE BUTTRESSES (8 directions) ===
for angle in range(0, 360, 45):
    rad = math.radians(angle)
    for d in range(base_r, base_r + 12):
        x = int(d * math.cos(rad))
        z = int(d * math.sin(rad))
        h = max(1, 20 - (d - base_r) * 2)
        for y in range(1, h):
            build.setblock(x, y, z, "deepslate_bricks")
        build.setblock(x, h, z, "soul_lantern")

# === PERIMETER OBELISKS ===
for angle in range(0, 360, 45):
    rad = math.radians(angle)
    ox = int(28 * math.cos(rad))
    oz = int(28 * math.sin(rad))
    for y in range(1, 16):
        build.setblock(ox, y, oz, "polished_blackstone")
    build.setblock(ox, 16, oz, "crying_obsidian")
    build.setblock(ox, 17, oz, "lantern")

print("The Obsidian Spire — Complete.")

name: The Colosseum of Mox

script:
# THE COLOSSEUM OF MOX — A grand Roman-style arena
build.clear()

# === FOUNDATION ===
build.fill(-31, 0, -31, 31, 0, 31, "smooth_sandstone")

outer_r = 30
inner_r = 18
tiers = 4
tier_h = 8
total_h = tiers * tier_h  # 32

# === OUTER WALLS — Elliptical with arches ===
for y in range(0, total_h + 1):
    tier = min(y // tier_h, tiers - 1)
    r = outer_r - tier * 2  # Each tier steps back
    
    for angle in range(360):
        rad = math.radians(angle)
        # Slightly elliptical
        x = int(r * math.cos(rad))
        z = int(r * 0.85 * math.sin(rad))
        
        build.setblock(x, y, z, "sandstone")

# === ARCHED OPENINGS (3 tiers of arches) ===
for tier in range(3):
    y_base = tier * tier_h + 2
    r = outer_r - tier * 2
    for angle in range(0, 360, 12):
        rad = math.radians(angle)
        for dy in range(0, 5):
            for da in range(-3, 4):
                a2 = math.radians(angle + da)
                x = int(r * math.cos(a2))
                z = int(r * 0.85 * math.sin(a2))
                build.setblock(x, y_base + dy, z, "air")

# === INTERIOR — Tiered seating ===
for tier in range(tiers):
    seat_r_outer = inner_r + (tiers - tier) * 3
    seat_r_inner = inner_r + (tiers - tier - 1) * 3
    seat_y = tier * 3 + 1
    
    for x in range(-seat_r_outer, seat_r_outer + 1):
        for z in range(-seat_r_outer, seat_r_outer + 1):
            d = math.sqrt(x*x + (z/0.85)**2)
            if seat_r_inner <= d <= seat_r_outer:
                build.setblock(x, seat_y, z, "smooth_sandstone")
                # Seats
                if d < seat_r_outer - 0.5:
                    build.setblock(x, seat_y + 1, z, "oak_stairs")

# === ARENA FLOOR ===
for x in range(-inner_r + 1, inner_r):
    for z in range(int((-inner_r + 1) * 0.85), int((inner_r) * 0.85)):
        d = math.sqrt(x*x + (z/0.85)**2)
        if d < inner_r - 1:
            if (x + z) % 3 == 0:
                build.setblock(x, 0, z, "red_sand")
            else:
                build.setblock(x, 0, z, "sand")

# === PILLARS between arches ===
for tier in range(tiers):
    r = outer_r - tier * 2
    y_base = tier * tier_h
    for angle in range(0, 360, 12):
        rad = math.radians(angle + 6)
        x = int(r * math.cos(rad))
        z = int(r * 0.85 * math.sin(rad))
        for y in range(y_base, y_base + tier_h + 1):
            build.setblock(x, y, z, "sandstone_wall")
        # Capitals
        build.setblock(x, y_base + tier_h, z, "chiseled_sandstone")

# === TOP RING — Crenellations and banners ===
for angle in range(360):
    rad = math.radians(angle)
    r = outer_r - (tiers - 1) * 2
    x = int(r * math.cos(rad))
    z = int(r * 0.85 * math.sin(rad))
    build.setblock(x, total_h + 1, z, "sandstone")
    if angle % 6 == 0:
        build.setblock(x, total_h + 2, z, "sandstone")
        build.setblock(x, total_h + 3, z, "sandstone")
    if angle % 24 == 0:
        build.setblock(x, total_h + 4, z, "red_wool")
        build.setblock(x, total_h + 5, z, "red_wool")
        build.setblock(x, total_h + 6, z, "gold_block")

# === EMPEROR'S BOX (north side, elevated) ===
build.fill(-6, 10, -inner_r - 2, 6, 17, -inner_r + 1, "quartz_block")
build.fill(-5, 11, -inner_r - 1, 5, 16, -inner_r, "air")
build.fill(-5, 10, -inner_r, 5, 10, -inner_r, "red_carpet")
# Throne
build.setblock(0, 11, -inner_r - 1, "gold_block")
build.setblock(0, 12, -inner_r - 1, "gold_block")
# Columns
for tx in [-5, 5]:
    for ty in range(11, 17):
        build.setblock(tx, ty, -inner_r, "quartz_pillar")
build.fill(-6, 17, -inner_r - 2, 6, 17, -inner_r + 1, "quartz_block")

# === UNDERGROUND CHAMBERS (hypogeum) ===
build.fill(-inner_r + 2, -4, -8, inner_r - 2, -1, 8, "stone_bricks")
build.fill(-inner_r + 3, -3, -7, inner_r - 3, -1, 7, "air")
# Corridors
build.fill(-2, -3, -7, 2, -1, 7, "air")
build.fill(-inner_r + 3, -3, -2, inner_r - 3, -1, 2, "air")
# Iron gates
for gz in [-7, 7]:
    build.fill(-1, -3, gz, 1, -1, gz, "iron_bars")
# Torches
for tx in range(-inner_r + 4, inner_r - 3, 4):
    build.setblock(tx, -1, -7, "lantern")
    build.setblock(tx, -1, 7, "lantern")

# === ENTRANCE GATES (4 cardinal) ===
for angle in [0, 90, 180, 270]:
    rad = math.radians(angle)
    gx = int((outer_r) * math.cos(rad))
    gz = int((outer_r) * 0.85 * math.sin(rad))
    # Clear entrance
    for dy in range(1, 7):
        for da in range(-4, 5):
            a2 = math.radians(angle + da)
            ex = int(outer_r * math.cos(a2))
            ez = int(outer_r * 0.85 * math.sin(a2))
            build.setblock(ex, dy, ez, "air")

# === STATUES at entrances ===
for angle in [0, 90, 180, 270]:
    rad = math.radians(angle)
    for side in [-8, 8]:

        x = int(r_light * math.cos(rad))

        build.setblock(x, 2, z, "lantern")

name: The Crystal Palace

script:
# THE CRYSTAL PALACE — An ethereal glass and ice structure
build.clear()

# === FROZEN LAKE FOUNDATION ===
for x in range(-31, 32):
    for z in range(-31, 32):
        d = math.sqrt(x*x + z*z)
        if d < 30:
            build.setblock(x, 0, z, "packed_ice")
            if random.random() > 0.7:
                build.setblock(x, 0, z, "blue_ice")
        else:
            build.setblock(x, 0, z, "snow_block")

# === CENTRAL CRYSTAL SPIRE ===
spire_h = 65
for y in range(1, spire_h):
    # Hexagonal cross-section that tapers
    r = max(1, int(8 * (1 - y / (spire_h * 1.2))))
    for angle in range(0, 360, 1):
        rad = math.radians(angle)
        # Hexagonal shape
        hex_angle = (angle % 60) - 30
        hex_factor = 1.0 / max(0.7, math.cos(math.radians(hex_angle)))
        actual_r = r * min(hex_factor, 1.2)
        
        x = int(actual_r * math.cos(rad))
        z = int(actual_r * math.sin(rad))
        
        if y % 4 == 0:
            block = "sea_lantern"
        elif y % 2 == 0:
            block = "blue_stained_glass"
        else:
            block = "white_stained_glass"
        build.setblock(x, y, z, block)

# Spire top
for y in range(spire_h, spire_h + 6):
    build.setblock(0, y, 0, "diamond_block")
build.setblock(0, spire_h + 6, 0, "beacon")

# === SIX SURROUNDING CRYSTAL TOWERS ===
for t_angle in range(0, 360, 60):
    rad = math.radians(t_angle)
    tcx = int(18 * math.cos(rad))
    tcz = int(18 * math.sin(rad))
    tower_h = 40
    
    for y in range(1, tower_h):
        r = max(1, int(4 * (1 - y / (tower_h * 1.3))))
        for angle in range(360):
            a2 = math.radians(angle)
            x = tcx + int(r * math.cos(a2))
            z = tcz + int(r * math.sin(a2))
            
            if y % 5 == 0:
                block = "sea_lantern"
            elif (y + t_angle // 60) % 3 == 0:
                block = "light_blue_stained_glass"
            else:
                block = "white_stained_glass"
            build.setblock(x, y, z, block)
    
    # Tower crystal top
    for y in range(tower_h, tower_h + 4):
        build.setblock(tcx, y, tcz, "diamond_block")
    build.setblock(tcx, tower_h + 4, tcz, "sea_lantern")

# === CRYSTAL BRIDGES connecting towers to center ===
for t_angle in range(0, 360, 60):
    rad = math.radians(t_angle)
    tcx = int(18 * math.cos(rad))
    tcz = int(18 * math.sin(rad))
    bridge_y = 15
    
    steps = 30
    for s in range(steps + 1):
        t = s / steps
        bx = int(tcx * (1 - t))
        bz = int(tcz * (1 - t))
        # Arch shape
        arch = int(5 * math.sin(t * math.pi))
        
        build.setblock(bx, bridge_y + arch, bz, "packed_ice")
        build.setblock(bx + 1, bridge_y + arch, bz, "packed_ice")
        build.setblock(bx, bridge_y + arch, bz + 1, "packed_ice")
        # Railings
        build.setblock(bx + 1, bridge_y + arch + 1, bz, "glass_pane")
        build.setblock(bx, bridge_y + arch + 1, bz + 1, "glass_pane")

# === CONNECTING BRIDGES between adjacent towers ===
for t_angle in range(0, 360, 60):
    rad1 = math.radians(t_angle)
    rad2 = math.radians(t_angle + 60)
    x1, z1 = int(18 * math.cos(rad1)), int(18 * math.sin(rad1))
    x2, z2 = int(18 * math.cos(rad2)), int(18 * math.sin(rad2))
    bridge_y = 25
    
    steps = 25
    for s in range(steps + 1):
        t = s / steps
        bx = int(x1 + (x2 - x1) * t)
        bz = int(z1 + (z2 - z1) * t)
        arch = int(3 * math.sin(t * math.pi))
        build.setblock(bx, bridge_y + arch, bz, "blue_ice")
        build.setblock(bx, bridge_y + arch + 1, bz, "glass_pane")

# === GRAND DOME over center ===

name: Willis Tower
description: Half-scale replica of Chicago's Willis Tower (Sears Tower). 9 bundled tubes in a 3x3 grid stepping back at different heights, reaching 221 blocks + 30-block antenna masts. Gray concrete and glass facade, Skydeck glass ledges, ground-level plaza with trees and street lamps. The tallest structure in MoltCraft.
script:
# WILLIS TOWER (SEARS TOWER) — Half Scale
# Real: 442m tall, 68m base, 9 bundled tubes stepping back
# Half scale: ~221 blocks tall, ~34x34 base
build.clear()

# === FOUNDATION ===
build.fill(-31, 0, -31, 31, 0, 31, "gray_concrete")
build.fill(-30, 0, -30, 30, 0, 30, "light_gray_concrete")

# Willis Tower is 9 square tubes in a 3x3 grid
# Each tube is ~11x11 at half scale
tube_size = 11
gap = 0  # tubes are bundled tight

# Tube centers (3x3 grid)
tube_centers = []
for gx in range(-1, 2):
    for gz in range(-1, 2):
        cx = gx * tube_size
        cz = gz * tube_size
        tube_centers.append((cx, cz, gx, gz))

# Setback heights (half scale of real setbacks)
# All 9 tubes go to floor ~50 → y=83
# NW and SE corners drop at 83
# NE and SW corners drop at 110  
# N, S, E drop at 147
# Two tallest tubes (center + one) go to 221
def tube_max_height(gx, gz):
    # Corner tubes (shortest)
    if (gx, gz) in [(-1, -1), (1, 1)]:
        return 83
    if (gx, gz) in [(-1, 1), (1, -1)]:
        return 110
    # Edge tubes
    if (gx, gz) in [(0, -1), (0, 1), (-1, 0)]:
        return 147
    # Two tallest (center and east)
    if (gx, gz) in [(0, 0), (1, 0)]:
        return 221
    return 83

# === BUILD TUBES ===
for cx, cz, gx, gz in tube_centers:
    h = tube_max_height(gx, gz)
    half = tube_size // 2
    
    # Outer walls
    build.fill(cx - half, 1, cz - half, cx + half, h, cz + half, "gray_concrete")
    # Hollow interior
    build.fill(cx - half + 1, 1, cz - half + 1, cx + half - 1, h - 1, cz + half - 1, "air")
    
    # Windows - dark glass strips every 2 blocks
    for y in range(2, h, 2):
        # North and south faces
        for x in range(cx - half + 1, cx + half, 2):
            build.setblock(x, y, cz - half, "gray_stained_glass")
            build.setblock(x, y, cz + half, "gray_stained_glass")
        # East and west faces
        for z in range(cz - half + 1, cz + half, 2):
            build.setblock(cx - half, y, z, "gray_stained_glass")
            build.setblock(cx + half, y, z, "gray_stained_glass")
    
    # Horizontal bands every 15 blocks (structural expression)
    for y in range(15, h, 15):
        build.fill(cx - half, y, cz - half, cx + half, y, cz + half, "black_concrete")
        build.fill(cx - half + 1, y, cz - half + 1, cx + half - 1, y, cz + half - 1, "air")
    
    # Roof of each tube
    build.fill(cx - half, h, cz - half, cx + half, h, cz + half, "black_concrete")

# === ANTENNA TOWERS on the two tallest tubes ===
# Willis Tower has two antenna masts
for cx, cz, gx, gz in tube_centers:
    if (gx, gz) in [(0, 0), (1, 0)]:
        h = 221
        # Main antenna
        for y in range(h + 1, h + 30):
            build.setblock(cx, y, cz, "iron_bars")
        build.setblock(cx, h + 30, cz, "redstone_lamp")
        # Cross beams
        for y in range(h + 5, h + 25, 8):
            build.setblock(cx - 1, y, cz, "iron_bars")
            build.setblock(cx + 1, y, cz, "iron_bars")
            build.setblock(cx, y, cz - 1, "iron_bars")
            build.setblock(cx, y, cz + 1, "iron_bars")

# === SKYDECK LEDGES (glass observation boxes) ===
# The real Willis Tower has glass ledge boxes on 103rd floor (~170 half scale)
ledge_y = 170
for offset in range(-2, 3):
    # West face ledges
    cx_l = -1 * tube_size - tube_size // 2 - 2
    cz_l = offset * 3
    build.fill(cx_l, ledge_y, cz_l - 1, cx_l - 2, ledge_y + 3, cz_l + 1, "white_stained_glass")
    build.fill(cx_l, ledge_y + 1, cz_l, cx_l - 1, ledge_y + 2, cz_l, "air")
    build.fill(cx_l - 1, ledge_y, cz_l - 1, cx_l - 2, ledge_y, cz_l + 1, "white_stained_glass")

# === ENTRANCE LOBBY (ground level) ===
# Main entrance on south side
build.fill(-8, 1, -tube_size * 2 + tube_size // 2, 8, 6, -tube_size * 2 + tube_size // 2, "air")
# Lobby canopy
build.fill(-10, 6, -tube_size * 2 + tube_size // 2 - 3, 10, 6, -tube_size * 2 + tube_size // 2, "black_concrete")
build.fill(-10, 7, -tube_size * 2 + tube_size // 2 - 3, 10, 7, -tube_size * 2 + tube_size // 2, "gray_stained_glass")

# Lobby interior
build.fill(-7, 0, -tube_size * 2 + tube_size // 2 - 2, 7, 0, -tube_size - 2, "polished_granite")
# Revolving door suggestion
build.fill(-2, 1, -tube_size * 2 + tube_size // 2, 2, 3, -tube_size * 2 + tube_size // 2, "glass")
build.fill(-1, 1, -tube_size * 2 + tube_size // 2, 1, 2, -tube_size * 2 + tube_size // 2, "air")

# === PLAZA with trees and benches ===
for tx in range(-28, 29, 8):
    for tz_base in [-28, 28]:
        # Tree
        build.setblock(tx, 0, tz_base, "grass_block")
        for y in range(1, 5):
            build.setblock(tx, y, tz_base, "oak_log")
        for dx in range(-2, 3):
            for dz in range(-2, 3):
                for dy in range(4, 7):
                    if abs(dx) + abs(dz) + abs(dy - 5) <= 3:
                        build.setblock(tx + dx, dy, tz_base + dz, "oak_leaves")

# Street lamps
for tx in range(-28, 29, 6):
    for tz_base in [-26, 26]:
        for y in range(1, 5):
            build.setblock(tx, y, tz_base, "iron_bars")
        build.setblock(tx, 5, tz_base, "lantern")

# === SETBACK ROOFTOP DETAILS ===
# Mechanical equipment on setback roofs
for cx, cz, gx, gz in tube_centers:
    h = tube_max_height(gx, gz)
    if h < 221:
        # AC units / mechanical
        build.setblock(cx - 2, h + 1, cz, "iron_block")
        build.setblock(cx + 2, h + 1, cz, "iron_block")
        build.setblock(cx, h + 1, cz - 2, "iron_block")

# Night lighting - lit windows scattered
for cx, cz, gx, gz in tube_centers:
    h = tube_max_height(gx, gz)
    for y in range(3, h - 1, 4):
        for face_angle in range(4):
            if random.random() > 0.5:
                if face_angle == 0:
                    wx = cx - tube_size // 2
                    wz = cz + random.randint(-tube_size // 2 + 1, tube_size // 2 - 1)
                elif face_angle == 1:
                    wx = cx + tube_size // 2
                    wz = cz + random.randint(-tube_size // 2 + 1, tube_size // 2 - 1)
                elif face_angle == 2:
                    wx = cx + random.randint(-tube_size // 2 + 1, tube_size // 2 - 1)
                    wz = cz - tube_size // 2
                else:
                    wx = cx + random.randint(-tube_size // 2 + 1, tube_size // 2 - 1)
                    wz = cz + tube_size // 2
                build.setblock(wx, y, wz, "sea_lantern")

print("Willis Tower (Half Scale) — Complete.")

name: The Dragon of Mox
description: A massive dragon sculpture in flight over scorched earth. Sinuous body, bat-like wings with translucent membrane spanning 56 blocks, fire breath streaming from its jaws, curved horns, taloned legs, spiked tail. Lava pools and magma below.
script:
# THE DRAGON OF MOX — A massive dragon sculpture in flight
build.clear()

# === SKY BASE — empty air, dragon hovers ===
build.fill(-31, 0, -31, 31, 0, 31, "black_concrete")

# Dragon body along X axis, head facing east (+X)
# Body is a tapered cylinder

body_len = 40
body_r = 6

# === BODY (sinuous curve) ===
for seg in range(body_len):
    t = seg / body_len
    # S-curve path
    bx = int(-15 + seg * 1.0)
    by = int(25 + math.sin(t * math.pi * 2) * 5)
    bz = int(math.sin(t * math.pi * 1.5) * 4)
    
    # Radius tapers at head and tail
    r = int(body_r * math.sin(max(0.15, t) * math.pi))
    if r < 1:
        r = 1
    
    for angle in range(360):
        rad = math.radians(angle)
        dy = int(r * math.cos(rad))
        dz = int(r * math.sin(rad))
        
        # Scale pattern
        if (seg + angle) % 12 < 3:
            block = "red_concrete"
        elif (seg + angle) % 12 < 6:
            block = "orange_concrete"
        else:
            block = "red_nether_bricks"
        build.setblock(bx, by + dy, bz + dz, block)

# === HEAD ===
head_x = 26
head_y = 25
head_z = 0

# Skull shape
for dx in range(0, 8):
    r = max(2, 5 - dx // 2)
    for angle in range(360):
        rad = math.radians(angle)
        dy = int(r * math.cos(rad))
        dz = int(r * math.sin(rad))
        build.setblock(head_x + dx, head_y + dy, head_z + dz, "red_nether_bricks")

# Eyes (glowing)
build.setblock(head_x + 5, head_y + 3, head_z - 3, "glowstone")
build.setblock(head_x + 5, head_y + 3, head_z + 3, "glowstone")
build.setblock(head_x + 6, head_y + 3, head_z - 3, "orange_stained_glass")
build.setblock(head_x + 6, head_y + 3, head_z + 3, "orange_stained_glass")

# Open jaw with fire
build.fill(head_x + 4, head_y - 3, head_z - 2, head_x + 8, head_y - 1, head_z + 2, "nether_bricks")
build.fill(head_x + 4, head_y + 1, head_z - 2, head_x + 8, head_y + 2, head_z + 2, "red_nether_bricks")
# Teeth
for tz in range(-2, 3):
    build.setblock(head_x + 7, head_y - 1, head_z + tz, "quartz_block")
    build.setblock(head_x + 7, head_y + 1, head_z + tz, "quartz_block")

# FIRE BREATH
for d in range(1, 14):
    fire_r = max(1, d // 3)
    for dy in range(-fire_r, fire_r + 1):
        for dz in range(-fire_r, fire_r + 1):
            if dy*dy + dz*dz <= fire_r * fire_r:
                if random.random() > 0.3:
                    if d < 5:
                        block = "white_concrete"
                    elif d < 9:
                        block = "yellow_concrete"
                    else:
                        block = "orange_concrete"
                    build.setblock(head_x + 8 + d, head_y - 1 + dy, head_z + dz, block)

# Horns
for hy in range(0, 6):
    build.setblock(head_x + 2, head_y + 5 + hy, head_z - 2, "nether_bricks")
    build.setblock(head_x + 2, head_y + 5 + hy, head_z + 2, "nether_bricks")
    build.setblock(head_x + 1 - hy // 3, head_y + 5 + hy, head_z - 2 - hy // 2, "nether_bricks")
    build.setblock(head_x + 1 - hy // 3, head_y + 5 + hy, head_z + 2 + hy // 2, "nether_bricks")

# === TAIL (long, curving, with spade tip) ===
for seg in range(30):
    t = seg / 30
    tx = int(-15 - seg * 0.6)
    ty = int(25 + math.sin(t * math.pi * 3) * 6 + seg * 0.3)
    tz = int(math.cos(t * math.pi * 2) * 8)
    
    r = max(1, int(4 * (1 - t * 0.8)))
    for angle in range(360):
        rad = math.radians(angle)
        dy = int(r * math.cos(rad))
        dz = int(r * math.sin(rad))
        build.setblock(tx, ty + dy, tz + dz, "red_nether_bricks")

# Tail spade
tail_end_x = int(-15 - 29 * 0.6)
tail_end_y = int(25 + math.sin(29/30 * math.pi * 3) * 6 + 29 * 0.3)
tail_end_z = int(math.cos(29/30 * math.pi * 2) * 8)
for dy in range(-4, 5):
    for dz in range(-3, 4):
        if abs(dy) + abs(dz) <= 4:
            build.setblock(tail_end_x - 1, tail_end_y + dy, tail_end_z + dz, "red_concrete")

# === WINGS (massive, bat-like) ===
wing_span = 28
wing_attach_y = 28

for side in [-1, 1]:
    # Wing arm bone
    for d in range(wing_span):
        wz = side * d
        wy = wing_attach_y + d // 4
        build.setblock(0, wy, wz, "nether_bricks")
        build.setblock(1, wy, wz, "nether_bricks")
        build.setblock(-1, wy, wz, "nether_bricks")
    
    # Wing fingers (3 per wing)
    for finger in range(3):
        f_start = 8 + finger * 7
        f_angle = (finger - 1) * 15
        for d in range(12):
            fz = side * (f_start + d)
            fx = int(-5 + finger * 6 + d * math.sin(math.radians(f_angle)))
            fy = wing_attach_y + f_start // 4 + d // 5
            build.setblock(fx, fy, fz, "nether_bricks")
    
    # Wing membrane
    for wz_local in range(3, wing_span):
        wz = side * wz_local
        max_x_forward = min(15, 3 + wz_local // 2)
        min_x_back = max(-10, -2 - wz_local // 3)
        membrane_y = wing_attach_y + wz_local // 4
        
        for wx in range(min_x_back, max_x_forward):
            if random.random() > 0.08:
                if (wx + wz_local) % 6 == 0:
                    block = "red_stained_glass"
                else:
                    block = "orange_stained_glass"
                build.setblock(wx, membrane_y, wz, block)
                if wz_local % 4 == 0:
                    build.setblock(wx, membrane_y + 1, wz, block)

# === LEGS (tucked under body) ===
for side in [-1, 1]:
    leg_z = side * 6
    # Thigh
    for y in range(15, 24):
        build.setblock(5, y, leg_z, "red_nether_bricks")
        build.setblock(5, y, leg_z + side, "red_nether_bricks")
    # Lower leg
    for y in range(8, 16):
        build.setblock(6, y, leg_z + side * 2, "red_nether_bricks")
    # Claws
    for cx in range(6, 10):
        build.setblock(cx, 8, leg_z + side * 2, "nether_bricks")
    build.setblock(10, 8, leg_z + side * 3, "nether_bricks")
    build.setblock(10, 8, leg_z + side * 1, "nether_bricks")

# === GROUND EFFECTS — scorched earth and fire glow ===
for x in range(-31, 32):
    for z in range(-31, 32):
        d = math.sqrt(x*x + z*z)
        if d < 28:
            if random.random() > 0.7:
                build.setblock(x, 0, z, "magma_block")
            elif random.random() > 0.5:
                build.setblock(x, 0, z, "netherrack")

# Lava pools
for i in range(8):
    lx = random.randint(-20, 20)
    lz = random.randint(-20, 20)
    for dx in range(-2, 3):
        for dz in range(-2, 3):
            if dx*dx + dz*dz <= 4:
                build.setblock(lx + dx, 0, lz + dz, "lava")

print("The Dragon of Mox — Complete.")

name: The Great Pyramid Complex

script:
# THE GREAT PYRAMID COMPLEX — Egyptian pyramid, sphinx, obelisks, temple
build.clear()

# === DESERT FLOOR ===
build.fill(-31, 0, -31, 31, 0, 31, "sand")
for x in range(-31, 32):
    for z in range(-31, 32):
        if random.random() > 0.85:
            build.setblock(x, 0, z, "sandstone")

# === MAIN PYRAMID ===
pyramid_size = 30
pyramid_x, pyramid_z = 0, 5

for y in range(pyramid_size):
    half = pyramid_size - y - 1
    x1 = pyramid_x - half
    x2 = pyramid_x + half
    z1 = pyramid_z - half
    z2 = pyramid_z + half
    
    # Outer shell
    build.fill(x1, y + 1, z1, x2, y + 1, z2, "sandstone")
    
    # Hollow interior (leave 2 block thick walls)
    if half > 3:
        build.fill(x1 + 2, y + 1, z1 + 2, x2 - 2, y + 1, z2 - 2, "air")
    
    # Smooth sandstone edges
    if y % 3 == 0:
        build.fill(x1, y + 1, z1, x2, y + 1, z1, "smooth_sandstone")
        build.fill(x1, y + 1, z2, x2, y + 1, z2, "smooth_sandstone")
        build.fill(x1, y + 1, z1, x1, y + 1, z2, "smooth_sandstone")
        build.fill(x2, y + 1, z1, x2, y + 1, z2, "smooth_sandstone")

# Gold capstone
build.setblock(pyramid_x, pyramid_size + 1, pyramid_z, "gold_block")
build.setblock(pyramid_x, pyramid_size, pyramid_z, "gold_block")
build.setblock(pyramid_x + 1, pyramid_size, pyramid_z, "gold_block")
build.setblock(pyramid_x - 1, pyramid_size, pyramid_z, "gold_block")
build.setblock(pyramid_x, pyramid_size, pyramid_z + 1, "gold_block")
build.setblock(pyramid_x, pyramid_size, pyramid_z - 1, "gold_block")

# === ENTRANCE (north face) ===
entrance_y = 8
build.fill(pyramid_x - 1, 1, pyramid_z - (pyramid_size - 1), pyramid_x + 1, entrance_y, pyramid_z - (pyramid_size - 1), "air")
# Entrance frame
build.fill(pyramid_x - 2, 1, pyramid_z - (pyramid_size - 1), pyramid_x - 2, entrance_y + 1, pyramid_z - (pyramid_size - 1), "chiseled_sandstone")
build.fill(pyramid_x + 2, 1, pyramid_z - (pyramid_size - 1), pyramid_x + 2, entrance_y + 1, pyramid_z - (pyramid_size - 1), "chiseled_sandstone")
build.fill(pyramid_x - 2, entrance_y + 1, pyramid_z - (pyramid_size - 1), pyramid_x + 2, entrance_y + 1, pyramid_z - (pyramid_size - 1), "chiseled_sandstone")

# Descending passage
for d in range(1, 12):
    py = entrance_y - d // 2
    pz = pyramid_z - (pyramid_size - 1) + d
    if py > 0:
        build.fill(pyramid_x - 1, py - 1, pz, pyramid_x + 1, py + 1, pz, "air")
        build.setblock(pyramid_x - 1, py + 2, pz, "sandstone")
        build.setblock(pyramid_x + 1, py + 2, pz, "sandstone")

# === BURIAL CHAMBER (center) ===
build.fill(pyramid_x - 4, 3, pyramid_z - 4, pyramid_x + 4, 7, pyramid_z + 4, "smooth_sandstone")
build.fill(pyramid_x - 3, 3, pyramid_z - 3, pyramid_x + 3, 6, pyramid_z + 3, "air")
# Sarcophagus
build.fill(pyramid_x - 1, 3, pyramid_z - 1, pyramid_x + 1, 4, pyramid_z + 1, "gold_block")
build.setblock(pyramid_x, 5, pyramid_z, "diamond_block")
# Treasure
for tx in [-3, 3]:
    for tz in [-3, 3]:
        build.setblock(pyramid_x + tx, 3, pyramid_z + tz, "gold_block")
        build.setblock(pyramid_x + tx, 4, pyramid_z + tz, "emerald_block")
# Torches
build.setblock(pyramid_x - 3, 5, pyramid_z, "lantern")
build.setblock(pyramid_x + 3, 5, pyramid_z, "lantern")
build.setblock(pyramid_x, 5, pyramid_z - 3, "lantern")
build.setblock(pyramid_x, 5, pyramid_z + 3, "lantern")
# Hieroglyph walls
for wx in range(-3, 4):
    for wy in range(3, 7):
        if (wx + wy) % 3 == 0:

name: The Kraken
description: A colossal sea monster erupting from the ocean. Massive prismarine head with glowing green eyes, beak, and 8 tentacles of varying poses reaching 25+ blocks out. One tentacle grasps a shipwreck with broken mast. Ocean foam and underwater glow effects.
script:
# THE KRAKEN — A colossal sea monster emerging from the deep
build.clear()

# === OCEAN SURFACE ===
for x in range(-31, 32):
    for z in range(-31, 32):
        # Wavy water surface
        wave = int(math.sin(x * 0.3) * math.cos(z * 0.3) * 2)
        water_y = 8 + wave
        for y in range(0, water_y + 1):
            if y == water_y:
                build.setblock(x, y, z, "blue_stained_glass")
            elif y == water_y - 1:
                build.setblock(x, y, z, "light_blue_stained_glass")
            else:
                build.setblock(x, y, z, "blue_concrete")

# === KRAKEN HEAD — massive, rising from center ===
head_cx, head_cz = 0, 0
head_base = 8  # At water level

# Head dome (bulbous)
head_r = 10
for y_off in range(head_r + 5):
    if y_off < head_r:
        r = int(math.sqrt(head_r * head_r - y_off * y_off))
    else:
        r = max(1, head_r - y_off)
    
    for angle in range(360):
        rad = math.radians(angle)
        x = int(r * math.cos(rad))
        z = int(r * math.sin(rad))
        
        if y_off % 4 == 0:
            block = "dark_prismarine"
        elif (angle + y_off * 3) % 20 < 5:
            block = "prismarine_bricks"
        else:
            block = "prismarine"
        build.setblock(head_cx + x, head_base + y_off, head_cz + z, block)

# Hollow interior for larger sections
for y_off in range(head_r - 2):
    r = int(math.sqrt((head_r - 2) * (head_r - 2) - y_off * y_off))
    if r > 1:
        for angle in range(0, 360, 2):
            rad = math.radians(angle)
            x = int(r * math.cos(rad))
            z = int(r * math.sin(rad))
            build.setblock(head_cx + x, head_base + y_off, head_cz + z, "air")

# === EYES (massive, glowing, menacing) ===
eye_y = head_base + 8
for side in [-1, 1]:
    ex = head_cx + side * 7
    ez = head_cz - 6
    # Eye socket
    for dx in range(-2, 3):
        for dy in range(-1, 3):
            build.setblock(ex + dx, eye_y + dy, ez, "dark_prismarine")
    # Glowing eye
    build.setblock(ex, eye_y, ez, "lime_stained_glass")
    build.setblock(ex, eye_y + 1, ez, "lime_stained_glass")
    build.setblock(ex + side, eye_y, ez, "lime_stained_glass")
    build.setblock(ex + side, eye_y + 1, ez, "lime_stained_glass")
    # Backlight
    build.setblock(ex, eye_y, ez + 1, "sea_lantern")
    build.setblock(ex + side, eye_y + 1, ez + 1, "sea_lantern")

# === BEAK / MAW ===
build.fill(head_cx - 4, head_base, head_cz - 10, head_cx + 4, head_base + 4, head_cz - 8, "dark_prismarine")
build.fill(head_cx - 3, head_base + 1, head_cz - 10, head_cx + 3, head_base + 3, head_cz - 9, "air")
# Beak points
build.setblock(head_cx, head_base + 4, head_cz - 11, "dark_prismarine")
build.setblock(head_cx, head_base, head_cz - 11, "dark_prismarine")
build.setblock(head_cx - 1, head_base + 4, head_cz - 11, "dark_prismarine")
build.setblock(head_cx + 1, head_base + 4, head_cz - 11, "dark_prismarine")

# === TENTACLES (8 of them, different poses) ===
tentacle_configs = [
    # (angle_deg, length, rise, wave_amp, wave_freq)
    (0, 28, 15, 6, 2.5),      # North — reaching high
    (45, 25, 8, 5, 2.0),      # NE
    (90, 26, 20, 7, 3.0),     # East — tall wave
    (135, 24, 5, 4, 1.5),     # SE — low sweep
    (180, 27, 12, 6, 2.0),    # South
    (225, 25, 18, 5, 2.5),    # SW — reaching
    (270, 26, 10, 7, 2.0),    # West
    (315, 24, 14, 4, 3.0),    # NW
]

for t_angle, t_len, t_rise, t_amp, t_freq in tentacle_configs:
    rad = math.radians(t_angle)
    
    for seg in range(t_len):
        t = seg / t_len
        
        # Tentacle path
        tx = head_cx + int((head_r + seg) * math.cos(rad))
        tz = head_cz + int((head_r + seg) * math.sin(rad))
        ty = head_base + int(t_rise * math.sin(t * math.pi)) + int(t_amp * math.sin(t * t_freq * math.pi))
        
        # Thickness tapers
        thick = max(1, int(4 * (1 - t * 0.7)))
        
        for dx in range(-thick, thick + 1):
            for dy in range(-thick, thick + 1):
                if dx*dx + dy*dy <= thick * thick:
                    if (seg + dx) % 5 == 0:
                        block = "dark_prismarine"
                    else:
                        block = "prismarine"
                    build.setblock(tx + dx, ty + dy, tz, block)
                    # Cross-section in Z too
                    build.setblock(tx, ty + dy, tz + dx, block)
        
        # Suckers (on underside)
        if seg % 3 == 0 and thick > 1:
            build.setblock(tx, ty - thick, tz, "sea_lantern")

    # Tentacle tip curl
    tip_x = head_cx + int((head_r + t_len) * math.cos(rad))
    tip_z = head_cz + int((head_r + t_len) * math.sin(rad))
    tip_y = head_base + int(t_rise * math.sin(math.pi)) + int(t_amp * math.sin(t_freq * math.pi))
    curl_rad = math.radians(t_angle + 90)
    for c in range(5):
        cx_c = tip_x + int(c * 0.7 * math.cos(curl_rad))
        cz_c = tip_z + int(c * 0.7 * math.sin(curl_rad))
        build.setblock(cx_c, tip_y + c, cz_c, "prismarine")

# === SHIPWRECK in tentacle grasp ===
ship_x, ship_z = 18, -15
ship_y = 12

# Hull
for sx in range(-6, 7):
    width = max(1, 3 - abs(sx) // 3)
    for sz in range(-width, width + 1):
        build.setblock(ship_x + sx, ship_y, ship_z + sz, "oak_planks")
        build.setblock(ship_x + sx, ship_y + 1, ship_z + sz, "oak_planks")
    # Hull sides
    build.setblock(ship_x + sx, ship_y + 2, ship_z - width, "oak_planks")
    build.setblock(ship_x + sx, ship_y + 2, ship_z + width, "oak_planks")

# Mast (broken)
for my in range(ship_y + 2, ship_y + 10):
    build.setblock(ship_x, my, ship_z, "oak_log")
# Broken mast tip angled
build.setblock(ship_x + 1, ship_y + 10, ship_z, "oak_log")
build.setblock(ship_x + 2, ship_y + 11, ship_z, "oak_log")

# Tattered sail
for sy in range(ship_y + 5, ship_y + 10):
    for sz in range(ship_z - 2, ship_z + 1):
        if random.random() > 0.3:
            build.setblock(ship_x + 1, sy, sz, "white_wool")

# === UNDERWATER GLOW ===
for i in range(40):
    gx = random.randint(-28, 28)
    gz = random.randint(-28, 28)
    gy = random.randint(1, 6)
    build.setblock(gx, gy, gz, "sea_lantern")

# === FOAM / SPLASH around emerging parts ===
for angle in range(0, 360, 5):
    rad = math.radians(angle)
    for r in range(head_r, head_r + 4):
        fx = head_cx + int(r * math.cos(rad))
        fz = head_cz + int(r * math.sin(rad))
        if random.random() > 0.4:
            build.setblock(fx, 9, fz, "white_concrete")
            if random.random() > 0.6:
                build.setblock(fx, 10, fz, "white_stained_glass")

print("The Kraken — Complete.")

for side, lx in [(-1, -10), (1, 10)]:
    for y in range(leg_h):
        # Legs taper slightly toward top, angle inward
        progress = y / leg_h
        offset_x = int(lx * (1 - progress * 0.8))  # Converge toward center
        r = max(2, int(4 * (1 - progress * 0.3)))
        
        for angle in range(360):

for ty in range(torch_y, torch_y + 8):

# Glowing core
for dy in range(6):

for seg in range(20):

# Shield/tablet
shield_x = -16
shield_y = shoulder_y - 8

build.setblock(0, head_y + 3, -head_r, dark_bronze)  # Mouth

    build.setblock(int(7 * math.cos(rad)), crown_y + 8, int(7 * math.sin(rad)), "sea_lantern")

# === HARBOR DETAILS ===
# Small boats
for bx, bz in [(-20, 15), (20, -18), (-5, 25)]:

for dz in range(-25, 26, 6):

        build.setblock(dx, 9, dz, "lantern")

        rad = math.radians(angle)
        x = int(5 * math.cos(rad))
        y = int(7 * math.sin(rad))
        build.setblock(x, bldg_base + 18 + y, face_z, "chiseled_quartz_block")
    # Smaller flanking arches
    for side_x in [-10, 10]:
        build.fill(side_x - 2, bldg_base, face_z, side_x + 2, bldg_base + 10, face_z, "air")
        for angle in range(0, 181):
            rad = math.radians(angle)
            x = int(2.5 * math.cos(rad))
            y = int(4 * math.sin(rad))
            build.setblock(side_x + x, bldg_base + 10 + y, face_z, "chiseled_quartz_block")

# Side face arches
for face_x in [-16, 16]:
    build.fill(face_x, bldg_base, 6, face_x, bldg_base + 18, 12, "air")
    for angle in range(0, 181):
        rad = math.radians(angle)
        z = int(3 * math.cos(rad)) + 9
        y = int(7 * math.sin(rad))
        build.setblock(face_x, bldg_base + 18 + y, z, "chiseled_quartz_block")

# === CENTRAL DOME (onion shape) ===
dome_base = bldg_base + bldg_h
dome_h = 28

for y in range(dome_h):
    t = y / dome_h
    # Onion dome profile: bulges then narrows
    if t < 0.6:
        r = int(12 * math.sin(t / 0.6 * math.pi * 0.6))
    else:
        r = max(1, int(8 * (1 - (t - 0.6) / 0.4) ** 1.5))
    
    for angle in range(360):
        rad = math.radians(angle)
        x = int(r * math.cos(rad))
        z = 9 + int(r * math.sin(rad))
        
        if y % 6 == 0:
            block = "smooth_quartz"
        elif angle % 20 < 4:
            block = "white_stained_glass"
        else:
            block = "quartz_block"
        build.setblock(x, dome_base + y, z, block)
    
    # Hollow
    if r > 2:
        ir = r - 1
        for angle in range(0, 360, 2):
            rad = math.radians(angle)
            x = int(ir * math.cos(rad))
            z = 9 + int(ir * math.sin(rad))
            build.setblock(x, dome_base + y, z, "air")

# Dome finial (spire)
for fy in range(dome_h, dome_h + 10):
    build.setblock(0, dome_base + fy, 9, "gold_block")
build.setblock(0, dome_base + dome_h + 10, 9, "sea_lantern")
# Crescent
build.setblock(1, dome_base + dome_h + 9, 9, "gold_block")
build.setblock(2, dome_base + dome_h + 8, 9, "gold_block")
build.setblock(2, dome_base + dome_h + 10, 9, "gold_block")

# === FOUR MINARETS ===
minaret_positions = [(-20, 0), (20, 0), (-20, 18), (20, 18)]
for mx, mz in minaret_positions:
    # Base (wider)
    for y in range(bldg_base, bldg_base + 5):
        build.fill(mx - 3, y, mz - 3, mx + 3, y, mz + 3, "quartz_block")
    
    # Main shaft
    for y in range(bldg_base + 5, bldg_base + 40):
        r = 2
        for angle in range(360):
            rad = math.radians(angle)
            x = mx + int(r * math.cos(rad))
            z = mz + int(r * math.sin(rad))
            build.setblock(x, y, z, "quartz_block")
        # Hollow
        for angle in range(0, 360, 3):
            rad = math.radians(angle)
            x = mx + int(1 * math.cos(rad))
            z = mz + int(1 * math.sin(rad))
            build.setblock(x, y, z, "air")
    
    # Balconies (3 levels)
    for bal_y in range(bldg_base + 12, bldg_base + 36, 10):
        for angle in range(360):
            rad = math.radians(angle)
            x = mx + int(4 * math.cos(rad))
            z = mz + int(4 * math.sin(rad))
            build.setblock(x, bal_y, z, "smooth_quartz")
            build.setblock(x, bal_y + 1, z, "quartz_block")
            if angle % 30 == 0:
                build.setblock(x, bal_y + 2, z, "lantern")
    
    # Small dome on top
    for dy in range(5):
        r = max(1, 3 - dy)
        for angle in range(360):
            rad = math.radians(angle)
            x = mx + int(r * math.cos(rad))
            z = mz + int(r * math.sin(rad))
            build.setblock(x, bldg_base + 40 + dy, z, "quartz_block")
    build.setblock(mx, bldg_base + 46, mz, "gold_block")
    build.setblock(mx, bldg_base + 47, mz, "sea_lantern")

# === INTERIOR ===
# Cenotaph (center)
build.fill(-2, bldg_base, 7, 2, bldg_base + 3, 11, "quartz_block")
build.fill(-1, bldg_base + 1, 8, 1, bldg_base + 2, 10, "white_concrete")
build.setblock(0, bldg_base + 3, 9, "diamond_block")

# Interior screen (jali — perforated)
for y in range(bldg_base + 1, bldg_base + 8):
    for angle in range(0, 360, 5):
        rad = math.radians(angle)
        x = int(5 * math.cos(rad))
        z = 9 + int(5 * math.sin(rad))
        if (y + angle // 5) % 2 == 0:
            build.setblock(x, y, z, "quartz_block")
        else:
            build.setblock(x, y, z, "air")

# Interior lighting
for y in range(bldg_base + 2, bldg_base + bldg_h, 5):
    build.setblock(0, y, 9, "sea_lantern")
for lx in [-12, -6, 6, 12]:
    for lz in [3, 9, 15]:
        build.setblock(lx, bldg_base + 1, lz, "lantern")

# === INLAY DECORATION (pietra dura) ===
# Flower patterns on exterior walls
for face_z in [0, 18]:
    for x in range(-14, 15, 7):
        for y_c in [bldg_base + 8, bldg_base + 22]:
            # Flower motif
            build.setblock(x, y_c, face_z, "emerald_block")
            for dd in [(-1,0),(1,0),(0,-1),(0,1)]:
                build.setblock(x + dd[0], y_c + dd[1], face_z, "lapis_block")

# === GARDENS (charbagh - four-part garden) ===
for qx, qz in [(-15, -20), (8, -20), (-15, -12), (8, -12)]:
    # Grass beds
    build.fill(qx, 0, qz, qx + 6, 0, qz + 6, "grass_block")
    # Flowers
    for fx in range(qx, qx + 7):
        for fz in range(qz, qz + 7):
            if random.random() > 0.5:
                flowers = ["poppy", "dandelion", "azure_bluet", "lily_of_the_valley", "allium"]
                build.setblock(fx, 1, fz, flowers[random.randint(0, 4)])
    # Corner trees
    for tx, tz in [(qx + 1, qz + 1), (qx + 5, qz + 5)]:
        for ty in range(1, 5):
            build.setblock(tx, ty, tz, "oak_log")
        for dx in range(-2, 3):
            for dz in range(-2, 3):
                for dy in range(4, 7):
                    if abs(dx) + abs(dz) <= 2:
                        build.setblock(tx + dx, dy, tz + dz, "oak_leaves")

# Path lighting
for z in range(-30, -4, 3):
    build.setblock(-5, 1, z, "lantern")
    build.setblock(5, 1, z, "lantern")

# === ENTRANCE GATE ===
build.fill(-8, 1, -31, 8, 12, -31, "red_sandstone")
build.fill(-4, 1, -31, 4, 10, -31, "air")
build.fill(-8, 12, -31, 8, 12, -31, "chiseled_red_sandstone")
# Small dome on gate
for dy in range(4):
    r = max(1, 3 - dy)
    build.fill(-r, 13 + dy, -31, r, 13 + dy, -31, "white_concrete")
build.setblock(0, 17, -31, "gold_block")
build.setblock(0, 18, -31, "sea_lantern")
# Gate lighting
build.setblock(-5, 6, -31, "sea_lantern")
build.setblock(5, 6, -31, "sea_lantern")

print("The Taj Mahal — Complete.")

name: Empire State Building
description: Half-scale Art Deco masterpiece. Classic stepped silhouette with 4 setbacks, 86th-floor observation deck with flood lights, iconic 5-tier illuminated crown, 35-block antenna with aviation lights. script:
# EMPIRE STATE BUILDING — Half Scale
# Real: 443m (inc antenna), Art Deco masterpiece
# Half scale: ~221 blocks total, stepped setbacks
build.clear()

# === GROUND PLAZA ===
build.fill(-31, 0, -31, 31, 0, 31, "gray_concrete")
build.fill(-28, 0, -28, 28, 0, 28, "light_gray_concrete")

# === LOBBY ENTRANCE (grand Art Deco) ===
build.fill(-14, 1, -18, 14, 8, -14, "smooth_stone")
build.fill(-12, 1, -17, 12, 7, -15, "air")
# Art deco entrance frame
build.fill(-6, 1, -18, 6, 8, -18, "gold_block")
build.fill(-4, 1, -18, 4, 7, -18, "air")
# Interior gold accents
build.fill(-12, 7, -17, 12, 7, -15, "gold_block")
for lx in range(-10, 11, 5):
    build.setblock(lx, 4, -16, "sea_lantern")

# === MAIN BASE (5 story base fills most of block) ===
base_h = 25
build.fill(-20, 1, -14, 20, base_h, 14, "smooth_stone")
build.fill(-19, 1, -13, 19, base_h - 1, 13, "air")

# Windows on base
for y in range(3, base_h, 3):
    for x in range(-19, 20, 3):
        build.setblock(x, y, -14, "light_gray_stained_glass")
        build.setblock(x, y + 1, -14, "light_gray_stained_glass")
        build.setblock(x, y, 14, "light_gray_stained_glass")
        build.setblock(x, y + 1, 14, "light_gray_stained_glass")
    for z in range(-13, 14, 3):
        build.setblock(-20, y, z, "light_gray_stained_glass")
        build.setblock(-20, y + 1, z, "light_gray_stained_glass")
        build.setblock(20, y, z, "light_gray_stained_glass")
        build.setblock(20, y + 1, z, "light_gray_stained_glass")
    # Interior floor lights
    build.setblock(0, y, 0, "sea_lantern")

# Base setback ledge
build.fill(-20, base_h, -14, 20, base_h, 14, "smooth_stone")
for x in range(-20, 21, 4):
    build.setblock(x, base_h + 1, -14, "lantern")
    build.setblock(x, base_h + 1, 14, "lantern")

# === FIRST SETBACK (narrower tower) ===
s1_h = 65
build.fill(-14, base_h + 1, -10, 14, base_h + s1_h, 10, "smooth_stone")
build.fill(-13, base_h + 1, -9, 13, base_h + s1_h - 1, 9, "air")

# Windows & vertical lines (Art Deco style)
for y in range(base_h + 2, base_h + s1_h, 2):
    for x in range(-13, 14, 2):
        build.setblock(x, y, -10, "light_gray_stained_glass")
        build.setblock(x, y, 10, "light_gray_stained_glass")
    for z in range(-9, 10, 2):
        build.setblock(-14, y, z, "light_gray_stained_glass")
        build.setblock(14, y, z, "light_gray_stained_glass")
    # Lit windows (random)
    if random.random() > 0.4:
        rx = random.randint(-13, 13)
        build.setblock(rx, y, -10, "sea_lantern")
    if random.random() > 0.4:
        rz = random.randint(-9, 9)
        build.setblock(14, y, rz, "sea_lantern")

# Vertical Art Deco ribs
for x in [-14, -7, 0, 7, 14]:
    for y in range(base_h + 1, base_h + s1_h + 1):
        build.setblock(x, y, -10, "smooth_stone")
        build.setblock(x, y, 10, "smooth_stone")
for z in [-10, -5, 0, 5, 10]:
    for y in range(base_h + 1, base_h + s1_h + 1):
        build.setblock(-14, y, z, "smooth_stone")
        build.setblock(14, y, z, "smooth_stone")

# Horizontal bands every 15 blocks
for y in range(base_h + 15, base_h + s1_h, 15):
    build.fill(-14, y, -10, 14, y, 10, "light_gray_concrete")
    build.fill(-13, y, -9, 13, y, 9, "air")

# Setback ledge
build.fill(-14, base_h + s1_h, -10, 14, base_h + s1_h, 10, "smooth_stone")

# === SECOND SETBACK ===
s2_base = base_h + s1_h
s2_h = 40
build.fill(-10, s2_base + 1, -7, 10, s2_base + s2_h, 7, "smooth_stone")
build.fill(-9, s2_base + 1, -6, 9, s2_base + s2_h - 1, 6, "air")

for y in range(s2_base + 2, s2_base + s2_h, 2):
    for x in range(-9, 10, 2):
        build.setblock(x, y, -7, "light_gray_stained_glass")
        build.setblock(x, y, 7, "light_gray_stained_glass")
    for z in range(-6, 7, 2):
        build.setblock(-10, y, z, "light_gray_stained_glass")
        build.setblock(10, y, z, "light_gray_stained_glass")
    if random.random() > 0.3:
        build.setblock(random.randint(-9, 9), y, -7, "sea_lantern")
        build.setblock(random.randint(-9, 9), y, 7, "sea_lantern")

# === THIRD SETBACK ===
s3_base = s2_base + s2_h
s3_h = 25
build.fill(-7, s3_base + 1, -5, 7, s3_base + s3_h, 5, "smooth_stone")
build.fill(-6, s3_base + 1, -4, 6, s3_base + s3_h - 1, 4, "air")

for y in range(s3_base + 2, s3_base + s3_h, 2):
    for x in range(-6, 7, 2):
        build.setblock(x, y, -5, "light_gray_stained_glass")
        build.setblock(x, y, 5, "light_gray_stained_glass")
    for z in range(-4, 5, 2):
        build.setblock(-7, y, z, "light_gray_stained_glass")
        build.setblock(7, y, z, "light_gray_stained_glass")

# === OBSERVATION DECK (86th floor equivalent) ===
obs_y = s3_base
build.fill(-12, obs_y, -9, 12, obs_y, 9, "smooth_stone")
# Railing
for x in range(-12, 13):
    build.setblock(x, obs_y + 1, -9, "iron_bars")
    build.setblock(x, obs_y + 1, 9, "iron_bars")
for z in range(-9, 10):
    build.setblock(-12, obs_y + 1, z, "iron_bars")
    build.setblock(12, obs_y + 1, z, "iron_bars")
# Flood lights pointing up
for x in range(-10, 11, 5):
    for z in range(-7, 8, 7):
        build.setblock(x, obs_y + 1, z, "sea_lantern")

# === CROWN (Art Deco tiered top) ===
crown_base = s3_base + s3_h
# Stepped crown tiers
for tier in range(5):
    r_x = 5 - tier
    r_z = 4 - tier
    tier_h = 4
    for y in range(crown_base + tier * tier_h, crown_base + (tier + 1) * tier_h):
        build.fill(-r_x, y, -r_z, r_x, y, r_z, "smooth_stone")
        if r_x > 1:
            build.fill(-r_x + 1, y, -r_z + 1, r_x - 1, y, r_z - 1, "air")
        # Windows in crown
        for x in range(-r_x, r_x + 1, 2):
            build.setblock(x, y, -r_z, "white_stained_glass")
            build.setblock(x, y, r_z, "white_stained_glass")
    # Lit band at each tier
    build.fill(-r_x, crown_base + (tier + 1) * tier_h - 1, -r_z, r_x, crown_base + (tier + 1) * tier_h - 1, r_z, "sea_lantern")

# === ANTENNA / SPIRE ===
antenna_base = crown_base + 20
for y in range(antenna_base, antenna_base + 35):
    build.setblock(0, y, 0, "iron_bars")
    # Cross supports
    if y % 6 == 0:
        build.setblock(1, y, 0, "iron_bars")
        build.setblock(-1, y, 0, "iron_bars")
        build.setblock(0, y, 1, "iron_bars")
        build.setblock(0, y, -1, "iron_bars")
    # Aviation warning lights
    if y % 10 == 0:
        build.setblock(1, y, 0, "redstone_lamp")
build.setblock(0, antenna_base + 35, 0, "redstone_lamp")
build.setblock(0, antenna_base + 36, 0, "sea_lantern")

# === EXTERIOR FLOOD LIGHTING (the famous colored lights) ===
# Upper section illumination
for y in range(s3_base, crown_base, 3):
    for x in [-7, 7]:
        build.setblock(x, y, 0, "sea_lantern")
    for z in [-5, 5]:
        build.setblock(0, y, z, "sea_lantern")

# Crown exterior glow
for tier in range(5):
    r_x = 5 - tier
    r_z = 4 - tier
    y = crown_base + tier * 4 + 2
    for x in range(-r_x, r_x + 1, 2):
        build.setblock(x, y, -r_z, "sea_lantern")
        build.setblock(x, y, r_z, "sea_lantern")
    for z in range(-r_z, r_z + 1, 2):
        build.setblock(-r_x, y, z, "sea_lantern")
        build.setblock(r_x, y, z, "sea_lantern")

# === STREET LEVEL DETAILS ===
# Sidewalk lamps
for lx in range(-28, 29, 6):
    for lz in [-25, 25]:
        for ly in range(1, 5):
            build.setblock(lx, ly, lz, "iron_bars")
        build.setblock(lx, 5, lz, "lantern")

# Parked cars (simple blocks)
for cx in range(-24, 25, 8):
    build.fill(cx - 2, 1, -28, cx + 2, 1, -28, "black_concrete")
    build.fill(cx - 1, 2, -28, cx + 1, 2, -28, "gray_stained_glass")
    build.setblock(cx - 2, 1, -28, "yellow_concrete")
    build.setblock(cx + 2, 1, -28, "red_concrete")

# Trees along street
for tx in range(-24, 25, 10):
    build.setblock(tx, 0, 20, "grass_block")
    for ty in range(1, 5):
        build.setblock(tx, ty, 20, "oak_log")
    for dx in range(-2, 3):
        for dz in range(-2, 3):
            for dy in range(4, 7):
                if abs(dx) + abs(dz) <= 2:
                    build.setblock(tx + dx, dy, 20 + dz, "oak_leaves")

print("Empire State Building (Half Scale) — Complete.")
